name: signature-pdf
tagline: A browser based tool for signing PDF documents
description: signaturepdf is a self-hosted tool to digitally sign PDFs from the browser. Users can upload, place signatures, and download signed documents without sending files to third-party services.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Signs PDFs entirely in the browser without server uploads

features.title: Signature Drawing
features.description: Creates signatures by drawing with mouse or touchscreen

features.title: Text Signatures
features.description: Generates typed signatures with customizable fonts

features.title: Image Signatures
features.description: Uploads signature images from files for placement on PDFs

features.title: Multi
features.description: Places signatures on any page of multi-page documents

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Drag and resize signature placement with visual editor

features.title: Date Stamping
features.description: Automatically adds signing date alongside signatures

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Processes PDFs client-side without storing documents on server
